page.title: 08HOBBIES
page.content: instance,was lovely.What I'm aiming for at the moment is nettles for a vegetable.(They're even more nutritious than spinach). If I'm not in a herby mood,I write or read stories.I'm on 'The Three Musketeers'at the moment.I've just got to the bit where Athos meets Milady and she turns out to be his wife.On the other hand,I've started the 'Little Flowers of St.Francis'and 'Swallowdale'. Owing to a seemingly permanent paper shortage,I keep my stories on a computer(Spectrum)tape.I'm entering for the H.E.Bates Short Story Competition,which I'm writing a saga at the moment,but otherwise it's mainly bedtime stories for Catherine, my little sister.I also enjoy the computer games,in which Chris and I are constant rivals.I hold the records
